thread.section_title: Spa World Australia Pty Ltd Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Spa World Australia Pty Ltd | spaworld.com.au
thread.title: Deborah Barnden
thread.title_full: Spa World Australia Pty Ltd reviewed by Deborah Barnden

author: Deborah Barnden
title: Deborah Barnden
text:
We have recently purchased a spa through Spa World and Vortex Spas in Osborne Park. Mark has been absolutely great in helping us from the purchase, delivery and ongoing advice for our Vortex Spa.
His professionalism is second to none.
And our spa? Could not be happier - it has to be one of the best investments we have made and the experience is incredible, especially after a stressful day and tired muscles!
Thank you Spa World and Mark Baugh.
